Republican Representative Mike Pence said Wednesday's repeal vote is not a symbolic act, but a promise kept to voters. So I urge my colleagues to join us in repealing this government takeover of health care before it ever takes effect, and then work with us, as we build healthcare reform that is worthy of the American people, said Mike Pence .
